title: Right Down Here – Asha Puthli
comment:
ゆったりと渦を巻く鍵盤やギターと高音・低音を見事に使い分けるヴォーカル。
ソウル〜ジャズのムードとバレアリックな浮遊感が溶け合うトリップ感のある一曲。

Swirling, laid-back keys and guitar, paired with vocals that glide effortlessly between highs and lows.
A trippy track where soul-jazz moods melt into a Balearic sense of float.
